Canny.title: Canny Edge Detection
Canny.tooltip: Find edges of the input image and filters them using the Canny algorithm.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: input image tensor with shape (B, C, H, W) and intensity from [0, 1].

low_threshold.title: low_threshold
low_threshold.tooltip: lower threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

high_threshold.title: high_threshold
high_threshold.tooltip: upper threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

kernel_size.title: kernel_size
kernel_size.tooltip: the size of the kernel for the gaussian blur.

sigma.title: sigma
sigma.tooltip: the standard deviation of the kernel for the gaussian blur.

hysteresis.title: hysteresis
hysteresis.tooltip: if True, applies the hysteresis edge tracking. Otherwise, the edges are divided between weak (0.5) and strong (1) edges. Default: True

eps.title: eps
eps.tooltip: regularization number to avoid NaN during backprop.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: image: the canny edge magnitudes map, shape of (B, 1, H, W).
